verbs.description: glenwood official [V: may] have committed perjury attorneys for former senate majority leader dean skelos and his son adam are again seeking to impugn a cooperating witness who testified against them in their first trial this time it charles dorego senior vice president and general counsel at glenwood management the manhattan luxury real estate giant that at the center of both the skelos case and the re - trial of former assembly speaker sheldon silver both skelos and silver were convicted in 2015 but now await new trials in the coming months due to a subsequent u s supreme court decision that vacated both verdicts adam skelos skelos dean skelos sheldon silver supreme court of the united states perjury charles dorego glenwood new mexico leonard litwin steven swarzman skeloses
